package.name: YouTubeZoom
package.shortDescription: Compatible with: iPhone X, iPhone Xs, iPhone Xs Max, iPhone Xr. iOS 11.0-13.2.2

descriptionlist.description: This tweak changes the values for YouTube's "Pinch To Zoom" feature, to zoom just up to about 18:9 aspect ratio, which is right up to the notch.

screenshot.description: This is a description for screenshot 1.
